document.full_text: the anti-lebron james faction of cleveland cavaliers fans has found a new way to protest against their former star: by supporting the dallas mavericks in the nba finals.
document.title: the anti-james twitter crowd gathers
lines_and_colors: the anti-lebron james faction of cleveland cavaliers fans has found a new way to protest against their former star: by supporting the dallas mavericks in the nba finals.
